name: Davison et al., Appellants, v. Mount Lebanon Township School District
name_abbreviation: Davison v. Mount Lebanon Township School District

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Davison et al., Appellants, v. Mount Lebanon Township School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellants to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Davison et al., Appellants, v. Mount Lebanon Township School District.
Argued November 11, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
reargument refused January 4,1971.
